    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle()
            throws HTTPException
        Set the response data to be a file on the server.
        Overrides:
        handle in class HTTPHandler
        Throws:
        HTTPException - When an IOException occurs, either because the the requested file doesn't exist, or there are problems reading the file.
        See Also:
        HTTPHandler.addGET(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), HTTPHandler.addPOST(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), HTTPHandler.NOT_A_METHOD_ERROR
